comments.author: DotNetShoutout
comments.message: Thank you for submitting this cool story - Trackback from DotNetShoutout

comments.author: Nick Gunn
comments.message: Good mini-series. I have a some code and binaries at http://fspread.codeplex.com that shows f# agents operating in a distributed environment using the Spread Toolkit. The server models are similar to yours and also show load-balancing, fault-tolerance and leader-election.
